website_summaries.verdict: Modern styling with a generous amount of shelf space for various equipment.
pros: Metal legs and wooden shelving offer a modern look
The tower construction makes it very sturdy
cons: Wider than some other audio towers

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! And it is very classically chic and sophisticated. The only issue is that the cross bars in the back vibrate together when put together. We put a napkin in between them to keep it from clattering but plan on putting some felt on there. It is very sturdy and well put together. I can't speak to assembly, my boyfriend put it together but he said he didn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelves for a contemporary look!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I am very happy with the product that I purchased. My packages arrived 2 days early and I was very excited. It took me about 2 hours to put them both together. The assembly was very easy as well. The 2 items are very sturdy and it's not that cheap wood that we often see. I was very happy to see this when I unwrapped them. I would recommend this to anyone else looking to purchase a good piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne B.

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is awesome! Love the look and the quality
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is awesome! Love the look and the quality. I bought it for our record collection which are very heavy and tend to make shelves bow, but this shelf is plenty strong enough to hold them without issue. We had to modify it a little so the records would not fall out the ends. We drilled a hole on the top through the metal and on the bottom and inserted a rod we picked up at the local hardware store. Works like a charm and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Beej

customer_reviews.title: Style and function a match for any room!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong it looks amazing in out living room. Bought the TV stand as a matching piece. Will buy other living room pieces in this style
customer_reviews.author: Karen Glaittli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the set we got. looks great, good quality and easy to out together.
customer_reviews.author: Dgwalt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well built shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well built shelving unit. Easy to put together. Came with paint for scratches and has an adjustable leveling knob to help keep shelf level on floor.. Definetly worth the purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D. White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, attractive, holds a lot. Good quality construction and look
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I bought the whole set it worked perfect for my house little nervous of the color but ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whole set it worked perfect for my house little nervous of the color but it was perfect we had been looking for about a year so when I saw this one I bought it im glad I did
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This audio tower looks very good against my wall and next to the tv stand. I only purchased one and will definitely get another to place on the opposite side. Easy install and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Looks great. Its very heavy but was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put it on casters so rearranging the room is a snap!
customer_reviews.author: WSW

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy ! Easy to assemble. Solid piece of furniture for a pre fab .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Good customer service from Whalen too for damaged parts.
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good and sturdy. I bought 2 of these. One is holding my technical books and the other is holding records.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, solid quality, looks great in our living room!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice in the room
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice in the room. Some of the shelves were nicked but over all for the price I got a great deal. I recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whalen Furniture Santa Fe Storage Shelf and Audio Tower Stand
product_meta.description: Designed to match the Santa Fe TV console, the Santa Fe audio tower shares the same combination of contemporary and rustic styling with the warm ash grain finish and heavy iron frame featuring a semi distressed iron wash finish and oversized rivets. Store and display your electronic components, accessories and books in this 32 inch wide by 60 tall by 15.75 Inch deep tower shelving unit. Combine two or more towers and the Santa fe TV console to create the ultimate entertainment wall.
feature_bullets: Store and display a/v components, accessories and books
Combine with matching console (sold separately) to create entertainment wall solution

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
